Articles.Content:
Hey guys, i am a HUGE fan of KSP and made a play through of it on youtube.I call it A.F.R.O Space Program. I would really like you guys to watch it and give me some feedback and let me know if im doing anything wrong or right. I could use some instruction. I am not really popular on youtube so its not a huge deal but i enjoy making videos and posting them, even if they end up getting only one view:D. Thanks for listening and checking me out!

channel: www.youtube.com/user/DizzyVG
